title: IBM Shares Falling After Hours Following 3Q Earnings Release
text:
By Stephen Nakrosis

Shares of International Business Machines Corp. (IBM) are trading lower in Wednesday's after-hours market, following the release of the company's third-quarter results.

At 6:16 p.m. ET, IBM's shares had fallen 5.14% to trade at $134.80. Volume in the after-hours market was more than 994,000 shares.

The company's stock ended the day's regular session with a 0.62% loss, closing at $142.11.

After the bell Wednesday, IBM reported sales of $18.03 billion, below analysts' expectations. Net income for the quarter was $1.67 billion, or $1.87 a share. In the year-ago period, the company reported net income of $2.69 billion, or $2.94 a share.

--Write to Stephen Nakrosis at stephen.nakrosis@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 16, 2019 18:40 ET (22:40 GMT)
